4637.quoteText: TARTLE does not sell, rent or lease its customer lists to third parties, ever
4637.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data

4638.quoteText:
TARTLE secures your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. TARTLE uses the following methods for this purpose:

– SSL Protocol

– AES-256bit Military Grade VPN Connecti
4638.title: info given about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices
